words.source: H7200 wayyiqtol 3mp Qal of רָאָה 'to see'; KJV 'did see', ESV 'saw', NASB 'realized'
H7860 n.mp constr. of שֹׁטֵר 'officer, foreman'; KJV 'officers of', ESV 'foremen of', NASB 'foremen of'
H1121 n.mp constr. of בֵּן 'son'; KJV 'children of', ESV 'people of', NASB 'sons of'
H3478 proper name; all trans. agree
H853 direct object marker + 3mp suff.; reflexive sense 'that they were'; KJV omitted, ESV implied, NASB 'that they were'
H7451 prep. b- + n.ms רַע 'evil, distress, trouble'; KJV 'in evil case', ESV 'in trouble', NASB 'in trouble'
H559 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of אָמַר 'to say'; introduces the decree
H3808 neg. particle; all trans. agree
H1639 Qal impf. 2mp of גָּרַע 'to diminish, reduce'; KJV 'ye shall not minish', ESV 'you shall not reduce', NASB 'you shall not reduce'
H3843 prep. min + n.fp constr. + 2mp suff. of לְבֵנָה 'brick'; KJV 'from your bricks', ESV 'from your number of bricks', NASB 'from your bricks'
H1697 n.ms constr. of דָּבָר 'word, matter, thing'; part of idiom 'daily quota'
H3117 n.ms of יוֹם 'day'; part of idiom 'day by day'
H3117 prep. b- + n.ms + 3ms suff. of יוֹם 'day'; completes idiom = 'daily quota'
